## beepr::beep()

Use 'beep()' to give yourself an audio alert.

## for loop + beep

```{r, eval = FALSE}
for (i in rev(seq(1:9999))) {
  print(paste(i, "bottles of beer on the wall"))
}

beep(4)
 
```

